While [Desert's Howl](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1723) is presumed to be unique, given its inexplicable origin, there have been reports of creatures resembling Desert's Howl that stalk the sands of Thuvia. Though quite similar to the descriptions of Desert's Howl, they seem to be individuals who haven't yet fully completed their transformation into the terrifying beast. Whether these unfortunate people met a cruel fate similar to that which spawned Desert's Howl or are spawn of the nightmarish creature itself is unclear. Some reports of encounters with these creatures note that it's possible to revert the creature back to its humanoid form by cleansing its mind of nightmarish visions, though there's no solid evidence of such an event ever occurring. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Howling Spawn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1724) **Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 23 **Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), fear scent 60 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +19 **Str** +7 **Dex** +6 **Con** +7 **Int** +3 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 **Fear Scent** Howling spawn can sense [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) creatures within 60 feet, using an incredibly accurate sense of psychic smell as a precise sense. --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +21 **Will** +18 **HP** 175 , regeneration [](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=26) 20 (deactivated by [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)) **Immunities** [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) **Resistances** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 15 **Weaknesses** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10 **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 60 feet, DC 27
**Putrid Evanescence** **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** The howling spawn is damaged by another creature; **Effect** The howling spawn bursts into a cloud of putrid smoke, ash, and nightmares, becoming [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) and teleporting up to 30 feet away to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the end of its next turn or until it uses a
[hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300), whichever comes first. --- **Speed** 35 feet, climb 20 feet, fly 15 feet, swim 30 feet **Melee** claw +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+13 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Ranged** spit +23 ([range 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 1d6 fire plus 1d6 mental and paralytic secretion **Occult Innate Spells** DC 27 - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Hallucinatory Terrain](/Spells.aspx?ID=145) - **5th** [Hallucination](/Spells.aspx?ID=144) **Illusory Ambush** The howling spawn shimmers with illusions and devastates a foe who lost track of its position. It Strides up to twice its Speed. If it ends its movement within its melee reach of at least one enemy to which it is [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), it can attempt two claw Strikes against that enemy. The howling spawn remains undetected to the creature it's attacking until after resolving both of the claw attacks. **Paralytic Secretion** The howling spawn's saliva is a potent paralytic substance that drains the energy from its prey. A creature hit by its spit Strike must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) as well as [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1 round. If the target was already drained, it instead increases the condition's value by 1, to a maximum of drained 4. **Profane Feast** **Requirements** The howling spawn has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The howling spawn begins to consume the creature, dealing 2d12+5 piercing damage (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save) and exposing the creature to its paralytic secretion.
name: Howling Spawn
